landing.subtitle: Transform Your Body, Transform Your Life

phrase1.part1: Build a body that speaks for you.

phrases.phrase2: Transform your physique. Transform your life.

phrase3.part1: With no muscles comes no respect.
phrase3.part2: Build a body that commands attention.

phrases.phrase4: Discipline builds muscle. Muscle builds confidence.
phrases.phrase6: Your body is your first impression. Make it count.

philosophy.legacy: We combine ambition with transformation. Through discipline and dedication, Golden Era delivers unmatchable results for those who dare to become successful people.
philosophy.text: In a world full of weak individuals, strength is what dominates. Transform your body with science. Reclaim your respect. This program is only for those who are ready to become part of the Elite.

results.title: Guaranteed
results.text: Train with those who lead this world. We only take 50 clients per year. This program is not for everyone, it's only for the ones who dare to become elite. Experience your ideal body in just 60 days.

coach.title: Your Coach
coach.name: Mateo H
coach.description: Fan of weights, and specialist in calisthenics, and MMA. CEO of Golden Era.

coaching.title: 12 week of personalized coaching
coaching.description: Designed for athletes and scientists which aim to release the best version of yourself.

apps.title: Apps designed specifically for you
apps.description: Best technology to monitor your progress and enhance your workouts.

recipes.title: Exclusive recipe book
recipes.description: Hundreds of recipes easy to make and feeding your body the healthiest way possible.

merch.title: Merch & Rewards
merch.description: Get access to our merch and existing exclusive rewards for our clients. This is to celebrate your commitment to yourself.

method.title: Golden Era Method
method.description: Golden Era creates leaders in this world. To become one, the way is not easy, and with us it is possible.

join.title: Join the club
join.description: Subscribe to your exclusive list of clients and begin fulfilling your legacy. Once you've registered and paid for the plan, we'll send you the online material you will be using for the next 12 weeks.

material.title: Use the material
material.description: Once you have received instructions on how to proceed by your personal coach and your other material, it's time to get to work. Get hustling.

work.title: Work on you
work.description: Don't forget to use the recipe book designed to help you grow. At the end of the program, you'll be at a better place than where you are now.

whyItWorks.subtitle: Our method is a compilation of science based lifting studies which unlock a persons full athletic potential.
whyItWorks.clickCard: Click on each card to learn more details.

technique.title: Perfect technique exercises
technique.frontText: The right exercises with the correct technique
technique.backText: Personalized coaching in every training session with real-time technique correction
technique.citation: *Based on NSCA and ACE Fitness principles

recipes.title: Exclusive recipe book
recipes.backText: Over 150 recipes designed by sports nutritionists to maximize your performance

science.title: Proven scientific foundation
science.backText: Based on NSCA, ACSM studies and the latest research in sports science
science.citation: *Methodology backed by Journal of Strength Research

motivational.buildBody: Build a body that speaks for you.

testimonial1.text: Greatness isn't born; it is achieved through relentless discipline.
testimonial1.author: Andrew Tate

testimonial2.text: Your body is your empire. Build it with sweat, not excuses.
testimonial2.author: Amades Llanos

testimonial3.text: The only way you gain mental toughness is to do things you're not happy doing. If you're comfortable, you're not growing.
testimonial3.author: David Goggins

footer.description: Stop waiting and start now. Contact us so we can help you get your dream body.
